Support Our Community

Your donation helps us continue our work in supporting and connecting the Nepalese community in Glasgow's Southside.

Make a Donation

Thank you for considering a donation to the Nepalese Southside Community Glasgow. Your generosity helps us continue our work in supporting the Nepalese community through cultural events, language classes, and community initiatives.

Bank Transfer Details

Account Name: Nepalese Southside Community Glasgow

Bank: Bank of Scotland

Account Number: 12345678

Sort Code: 12-34-56

Reference: DONATION-[Your Name]

Gift Aid

If you are a UK taxpayer, you can increase the value of your donation by 25% at no extra cost to you through Gift Aid. Please email us at contact@nscg.org to request a Gift Aid declaration form.

Other Ways to Support

If you'd like to discuss other ways to support our organization, including volunteering opportunities or event sponsorship, please get in touch with us through our Contact page.

Where Your Money Goes

  • Supporting language and cultural education programs
  • Organizing community events and festivals
  • Maintaining community spaces and resources

Other Ways to Support

  • Volunteer your time and skills
  • Sponsor our events
  • Share our cause with others
